EPalWazaID::AcidRain.description:
Creates acidic clouds that
pour down acid rain on enemies.
EPalWazaID::AcidRain.name: Acid Rain

EPalWazaID::AirBlade.description: Sends out sharp blades of air in a fan shape.
EPalWazaID::AirBlade.name: Air Blade

EPalWazaID::AirCanon.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.
EPalWazaID::AirCanon.name: Air Cannon

EPalWazaID::Apocalypse.description: Generates several dark vortexes in the surrounding area.
EPalWazaID::Apocalypse.name: Apocalypse

EPalWazaID::AquaJet.description:
Hurls a high speed ball of water
at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::AquaJet.name: Hydro Jet

EPalWazaID::BeamSlicer.description:
Mows down the frontal area with a beam imbued with dragon power.
The area touched by the beam will also explode after a few moments.
EPalWazaID::BeamSlicer.name: Beam Slicer

EPalWazaID::BlastCanon.description:
Fires an energy bullet imbued with dragon power at the enemy's location.
Upon impact, the bullet shatters and creates a frontal long-range explosion.
EPalWazaID::BlastCanon.name: Blast Cannon

EPalWazaID::BlizzardLance.description:
Summons a sharp ice lance
under an enemy.
EPalWazaID::BlizzardLance.name: Iceberg

EPalWazaID::BubbleShot.description:
Fires numerous bubbles
that slowly pursue an enemy.
EPalWazaID::BubbleShot.name: Bubble Blast

EPalWazaID::ChaosLaser.description:
Charge the power of chaos,
Fires a beam of light and darkness at the enemy at the same time.
EPalWazaID::ChaosLaser.name: Chaos Laser

EPalWazaID::ChargeCanon.description:
An energy bullet charged with the power of a dragon.
Fire at the enemy. When the bullet hits the
Causes a wide explosion.
EPalWazaID::ChargeCanon.name: Charge Cannon

EPalWazaID::Commet.description:
Drops a meteorite straight down,
generating a shock wave around the impact area.
EPalWazaID::Commet.name: Comet Strike

EPalWazaID::CommetRain.description:
Drops countless meteorites,
generating an array of shock waves.
EPalWazaID::CommetRain.name: Meteorain

EPalWazaID::CrossThunder.description:
Generates two lightning bolts that advance left and right,
blocking either direction.
EPalWazaID::CrossThunder.name: Cross Lightning

EPalWazaID::DarkArrow.description:
Fires off dark energy
that homes in on an enemy.
EPalWazaID::DarkArrow.name: Dark Arrow

EPalWazaID::DarkBall.description:
Unleashes a sphere of darkness 
that slowly tracks down an enemy.
EPalWazaID::DarkBall.name: Dark Ball

EPalWazaID::DarkCanon.description:
Hurls an energy ball imbued
with dark energy at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::DarkCanon.name: Dark Cannon

EPalWazaID::DarkLaser.description:
Charges dark energy before
blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
EPalWazaID::DarkLaser.name: Dark Laser

EPalWazaID::DarkLegion.description: Fires a menacing ball of dark energy that pursues enemies.
EPalWazaID::DarkLegion.name: Dark Whisp

EPalWazaID::DarkPulse.description:
Fires a high speed ball of dark energy that
spreads forward in a radial shape.
EPalWazaID::DarkPulse.name: Umbral Surge

EPalWazaID::DarkWave.description:
Quickly discharges dark energy,
damaging those around it.
EPalWazaID::DarkWave.name: Shadow Burst

EPalWazaID::DiamondFall.description:
Creates numerous lumps of ice that are
consecutively dropped on a foe's head.
EPalWazaID::DiamondFall.name: Diamond Rain

EPalWazaID::DoubleIcicleThrow.description:
Creates two huge ice blocks
and fires them at the enemy one after another.
On impact, it also shocks those close by.
EPalWazaID::DoubleIcicleThrow.name: Double Blizzard Spike

EPalWazaID::DragonBreath.description:
Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy,
dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.
EPalWazaID::DragonBreath.name: Draconic Breath

EPalWazaID::DragonCanon.description:
Hurls an energy ball imbued
with draconic energy at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::DragonCanon.name: Dragon Cannon

EPalWazaID::DragonMeteor.description:
Summons numerous small meteorites
and launches them at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::DragonMeteor.name: Dragon Meteor

EPalWazaID::DragonWave.description:
Quickly discharges draconic energy,
damaging those around it.
EPalWazaID::DragonWave.name: Dragon Burst

EPalWazaID::ElecWave.description:
Quickly discharges electricity,
shocking those around it.
EPalWazaID::ElecWave.name: Shockwave

EPalWazaID::Eruption.description:
Fires countless volcanic bombs into the sky.
After a while, the bombs rain down around their originator.
EPalWazaID::Eruption.name: Volcanic Rain

EPalWazaID::FireBall.description:
Creates a giant ball of flame and hurls it at an enemy.
The ball explodes over a wide area upon impact.
EPalWazaID::FireBall.name: Fire Ball

EPalWazaID::FireBlast.description:
Hurls a ball of fire
straight at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::FireBlast.name: Ignis Blast

EPalWazaID::FireSeed.description:
Shoots fireballs towards an enemy.
The fireballs explode after a short distance,
generating smaller fireballs that spread forward.
EPalWazaID::FireSeed.name: Spirit Fire

EPalWazaID::FlameFunnel.description:
Creates multiple spheres of fiery energy,
from which countless fireballs shoot towards the enemy.
EPalWazaID::FlameFunnel.name: Flame Funnel

EPalWazaID::FlameWall.description:
Creates a wall of flames at the enemy's location.
The wall of flame will remain for a while,
and deal damage to the enemies it touches.
EPalWazaID::FlameWall.name: Flame Wall

EPalWazaID::Flamethrower.description:
Shoots flames at an enemy,
dealing continuous damage.
EPalWazaID::Flamethrower.name: Ignis Breath

EPalWazaID::FlareArrow.description:
Fires three flaming arrows in succession
that home in on an enemy.
EPalWazaID::FlareArrow.name: Flare Arrow

EPalWazaID::FlareTornado.description:
Generates two flaming tornadoes on either side
before launching them at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::FlareTornado.name: Flare Storm

EPalWazaID::FlareTwister.description:
Creates multiple flame tornadoes.
The tornado continues to spin in circles.
EPalWazaID::FlareTwister.name: Flare Twister

EPalWazaID::FrostBreath.description:
Enshrouds an enemy in a frigid blast of air,
dealing continuous damage.
EPalWazaID::FrostBreath.name: Crystal Breath

EPalWazaID::GhostFlame.description:
Fires three balls of malice
that relentlessly pursue an enemy.
EPalWazaID::GhostFlame.name: Spirit Flame

EPalWazaID::GrassTornado.description:
Generates two tornadoes on either side
before launching them at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::GrassTornado.name: Grass Tornado

EPalWazaID::HolyBlast.description:
Creates a wide explosion of light
at the enemy's location and around it.
EPalWazaID::HolyBlast.name: Holy Burst

EPalWazaID::Human_Punch.description: Punch with conviction; believe in the power of the fist.
EPalWazaID::Human_Punch.name: Punch

EPalWazaID::HydroPump.description:
Shoots pressurized water at extreme velocities,
sweeping over a wide area in front of it.
EPalWazaID::HydroPump.name: Hydro Laser

EPalWazaID::HyperBeam.description:
Charges destructive energy before firing
a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.
EPalWazaID::HyperBeam.name: Pal Blast

EPalWazaID::IceAge.description: Throws icicles in a wide area from under the enemy's feet.
EPalWazaID::IceAge.name: Absolute Frost

EPalWazaID::IceBlade.description:
Creates a crescent blade of ice
and hurls it forward.
EPalWazaID::IceBlade.name: Icicle Cutter

EPalWazaID::IceMissile.description:
Creates ice lances in the air
that fly towards enemies.
EPalWazaID::IceMissile.name: Ice Missile

EPalWazaID::IcicleLine.description: Generates pillars of ice that moves in a straight line.
EPalWazaID::IcicleLine.name: Icicle Line

EPalWazaID::IciclePierce.description:
Generates multiple sharp ice blocks in the sky
and fires them at the enemy.
EPalWazaID::IciclePierce.name: Icicle Bullet

EPalWazaID::IcicleThrow.description:
Creates a giant lump of ice and hurls it at an enemy.
It deals damage to those in the surrounding area upon impact.
EPalWazaID::IcicleThrow.name: Blizzard Spike

EPalWazaID::Inferno.description:
Energizes the surrounding ground,
causing it to explode after a set amount of time.
EPalWazaID::Inferno.name: Ignis Rage

EPalWazaID::Intimidate.description: Generates a fog of poison in front, causing the opponent to become poisoned.
EPalWazaID::Intimidate.name: Intimidate

EPalWazaID::LightningStrike.description:
Acts as a lightning rod, calling down thunderbolts
that electrocute the surrounding area.
EPalWazaID::LightningStrike.name: Lightning Strike

EPalWazaID::LineGeyser.description: Generates a column of water that travels in a straight line.
EPalWazaID::LineGeyser.name: Splash

EPalWazaID::LineThunder.description:
Generates a lightning bolt
that moves forward in a line.
EPalWazaID::LineThunder.name: Lightning Streak

EPalWazaID::LockonLaser.description:
Takes aim at an enemy before
firing a super high speed laser.
EPalWazaID::LockonLaser.name: Lock-on Laser

EPalWazaID::MudShot.description:
Hurls sticky mud
at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::MudShot.name: Bog Blast

EPalWazaID::PoisonFog.description:
Generates a fog of poison in front, 
causing the opponent to become poisoned.
EPalWazaID::PoisonFog.name: Poison Fog

EPalWazaID::PoisonShot.description:
Hurls poison sludge
at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::PoisonShot.name: Poison Blast

EPalWazaID::PowerBall.description:
Charges a massive amount of energy
before firing a large destructive ball.
EPalWazaID::PowerBall.name: Power Bomb

EPalWazaID::PowerShot.description:
Charges energy
into a focused blast.
EPalWazaID::PowerShot.name: Power Shot

EPalWazaID::Psychokinesis.description:
Utilizes psychokinesis to grab enemies
before flinging them to the ground from above.
EPalWazaID::Psychokinesis.name: Psycho Gravity

EPalWazaID::RaidCutter.description:
Shoots countless wind swords 
that fly straight towards the enemy.
EPalWazaID::RaidCutter.name: Raid Cutter

EPalWazaID::Railbolt.description:
Charge the power of lightning to the limit
and fires multiple simultaneous electric shocks at the enemy.
EPalWazaID::Railbolt.name: Thunder Rail

EPalWazaID::RangeThunder.description:
Generates lightning strikes that travel 
in a straight line in all directions.
EPalWazaID::RangeThunder.name: All Range Thunder

EPalWazaID::RockLance.description:
Generates a sharp rock spear
under an enemy.
EPalWazaID::RockLance.name: Rock Lance

EPalWazaID::RootAttack.description:
Generates spiny thorns that chase an enemy
along the ground, piercing them from below.
EPalWazaID::RootAttack.name: Spine Vine

EPalWazaID::RootLance.description:
Sprots sharp roots
in and around the enemy's location.
EPalWazaID::RootLance.name: Circle Vine

EPalWazaID::SandTornado.description:
Generates two sand tornadoes on either side
before launching them at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::SandTornado.name: Sand Tornado

EPalWazaID::SandTwister.description:
Creates multiple sand tornadoes.
The tornadoes continuously spin in circles.
EPalWazaID::SandTwister.name: Sand Twister

EPalWazaID::SeedMachinegun.description:
Fires a volley of hard seeds
at enemies in front of it.
EPalWazaID::SeedMachinegun.name: Seed Machine Gun

EPalWazaID::SeedMine.description:
Launches a deadly seed.
If it hits an enemy, the seed explodes.
EPalWazaID::SeedMine.name: Seed Mine

EPalWazaID::SelfDestruct.description:
Risks its life to cause a violent explosion.
Becomes incapacitated afterwards.
EPalWazaID::SelfDestruct.name: Implode

EPalWazaID::SelfDestruct_Bee.description:
Risks its life to cause a violent explosion,
but receives the honor of falling in battle.
EPalWazaID::SelfDestruct_Bee.name: Bee Quiet

EPalWazaID::SelfExplosion.description:
Risks life to cause a massive explosion.
Those who perish for their duty become glistening stars in the night sky.
EPalWazaID::SelfExplosion.name: Megaton Implode

EPalWazaID::ShadowBall.description:
Creates a giant ball of darkness
and hurls it at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::ShadowBall.name: Nightmare Ball

EPalWazaID::ShokeiLaser.description:
After aiming at the enemy,
fires multiple ultra-fast lightning lasers.
EPalWazaID::ShokeiLaser.name: Lethal Laser

EPalWazaID::SolarBeam.description:
Charges solar energy before
blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
EPalWazaID::SolarBeam.name: Solar Blast

EPalWazaID::SpecialCutter.description:
The user fires three high-speed blades of wind
in quick succession that fly straight at enemies.
EPalWazaID::SpecialCutter.name: Multicutter

EPalWazaID::SpreadPulse.description:
The user releases a lightning ball
that expands outward in a forward, circular pattern.
EPalWazaID::SpreadPulse.name: Spark Blast

EPalWazaID::StarMine.description:
Generates stars around the enemy that explode on contact.
Stars also explode after some time.
EPalWazaID::StarMine.name: Star Mine

EPalWazaID::StoneShotgun.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.
EPalWazaID::StoneShotgun.name: Stone Blast

EPalWazaID::ThreeCommet.description:
Drops meteorites one after another,
generating shock waves around the impact areas.
EPalWazaID::ThreeCommet.name: Comet Barrage

EPalWazaID::ThreeThunder.description:
Generates lightning that strikes
an enemy three times from above.
EPalWazaID::ThreeThunder.name: Tri-Lightning

EPalWazaID::ThrowRock.description:
Digs up a boulder
and hurls it at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::ThrowRock.name: Stone Cannon

EPalWazaID::ThunderBall.description:
Fires an electric ball
that slowly pursues an enemy.
EPalWazaID::ThunderBall.name: Electric Ball

EPalWazaID::ThunderFunnel.description:
Creates two balls of electric energy
that fire numerous lightning orbs at enemies.
EPalWazaID::ThunderFunnel.name: Plasma Funnel

EPalWazaID::ThunderRain.description:
Calls lightning that strikes an enemy
after a set amount of time has passed.
EPalWazaID::ThunderRain.name: Thunder Rain

EPalWazaID::ThunderStorm.description:
Generates a huge tornado of lightning
that moves slowly towards the enemy.
EPalWazaID::ThunderStorm.name: Thunderstorm

EPalWazaID::Thunderbolt.description:
Charges electric energy before
blasting enemies with a powerful shock.
EPalWazaID::Thunderbolt.name: Lightning Bolt

EPalWazaID::Tremor.description: Causes the ground to shake before hurling a massive stone mass at its surroundings.
EPalWazaID::Tremor.name: Rockburst

EPalWazaID::TripleCannon.description:
An energy bullet filled with the power of a dragon.
Fires 3 shots in a row at the enemy.
EPalWazaID::TripleCannon.name: Triple Cannon

EPalWazaID::TriSpark.description:
A high-speed lightning ball that flies in a straight line.
Simultaneously fires slow lightning balls that track the enemy.
EPalWazaID::TriSpark.name: TriSpark

EPalWazaID::Unique_Alpaca_Tackle.description:
Melpaca's exclusive skill.
Charges forward while clad in an aura of sublime adorableness.
EPalWazaID::Unique_Alpaca_Tackle.name: Fluffy Tackle

EPalWazaID::Unique_AmaterasuWolf_FireCha.description:
Kitsun's exclusive skill.
Charges forward with great speed while clad in intense blue flames.
EPalWazaID::Unique_AmaterasuWolf_FireCha.name: Daring Flames

EPalWazaID::Unique_Anubis_GroundPunch.description:
Anubis's exclusive skill.
Leaps high into the air before diving to the ground with a punch.
The force of the impact deals damage over a wide area.
EPalWazaID::Unique_Anubis_GroundPunch.name: Ground Smash

EPalWazaID::Unique_Anubis_LowRoundKick.description:
Anubis's exclusive skill.
Performs a spin kick with its strong legs, cutting down enemies over a wide area.
EPalWazaID::Unique_Anubis_LowRoundKick.name: Spinning Roundhouse

EPalWazaID::Unique_Anubis_Tackle.description:
Anubis's exclusive skill.
Pursues its foe with a high speed dash
while releasing energy and unleashes a powerful punch.
EPalWazaID::Unique_Anubis_Tackle.name: Forceful Charge

EPalWazaID::Unique_Baphomet_SwallowKite.description:
Incineram's exclusive skill.
Draws near enemies using its left claw to slash them into the air
before cutting them down with its right claw.
EPalWazaID::Unique_Baphomet_SwallowKite.name: Hellfire Claw

EPalWazaID::Unique_BlackCentaur_TwoSpear.description:
Necromus' exclusive skill.
Clads its twin spears with vicious whirlwinds and charges forward,
thrusting them one after the other.
EPalWazaID::Unique_BlackCentaur_TwoSpear.name: Twin Spears

EPalWazaID::Unique_BlackGriffon_TackleLa.description:
Shadowbeak's exclusive skill.
Charges forward while generating orbs of light that automatically capture enemies.
The orbs automatically capture enemies, before releasing a barrage of lasers.
EPalWazaID::Unique_BlackGriffon_TackleLa.name: Divine Disaster

EPalWazaID::Unique_BlackGriffon_TackleLa.description:
Shadowbeak's exclusive skill.
Charges forward, generating orbs of light that automatically target enemies and unleash a barrage of lasers.
EPalWazaID::Unique_BlackGriffon_TackleLa.name: Divine Disaster II

EPalWazaID::Unique_BluePlatypus_Toboggan.description: Slides on water to attack enemies.
EPalWazaID::Unique_BluePlatypus_Toboggan.name: Surfing Slam

EPalWazaID::Unique_Boar_Tackle.description:
Rushoar's exclusive skill.
Takes aim at a foe and rushes at them with a mad charge.
EPalWazaID::Unique_Boar_Tackle.name: Reckless Charge

EPalWazaID::Unique_CaptainPenguin_BodySl.description:
Penking's exclusive skill.
Lies on its belly while generating frozen air all around it
before sliding at enemies at high speed.
EPalWazaID::Unique_CaptainPenguin_BodySl.name: Emperor Slide

EPalWazaID::Unique_ChickenPal_ChickenPec.description:
Chikipi's exclusive skill.
Flies at enemies in its sights, attacking them with its sharp beak.
EPalWazaID::Unique_ChickenPal_ChickenPec.name: Chicken Rush

EPalWazaID::Unique_DarkCrow_TelePoke.description:
Cawgnito's exclusive skill.
Teleports next to an enemy
before attacking with its beak.
EPalWazaID::Unique_DarkCrow_TelePoke.name: Phantom Peck

EPalWazaID::Unique_DarkScorpion_Pierce.description:
Menasting's exclusive skill.
Jumps high and stabs its prey with its tail.
The poison from the tail is deadly.
EPalWazaID::Unique_DarkScorpion_Pierce.name: Jumping Stinger

EPalWazaID::Unique_Deer_PushupHorn.description:
Eikthyrdeer's exclusive skill.
Charges at foes and uses antlers to launch them into the air.
If used while riding, the direction of the charge can be controlled.
EPalWazaID::Unique_Deer_PushupHorn.name: Antler Uppercut

EPalWazaID::Unique_DrillGame_ShellAttack.description:
Digtoise's exclusive skill.
Moves while spinning its whole body at high speeds.
Drills through enemies, dealing continuous damage.
EPalWazaID::Unique_DrillGame_ShellAttack.name: Shell Spin

EPalWazaID::Unique_Eagle_GlidingNail.description:
Galeclaw's exclusive skill.
Soars through the air
with its talons outstretched forward.
EPalWazaID::Unique_Eagle_GlidingNail.name: Gale Claw

EPalWazaID::Unique_ElecPanda_ElecScratch.description:
Grizzbolt's exclusive skill.
After leaping at an enemy and tearing at it twice with its electrically charged claws, it attacks the ground, sending an electric shock throughout the area.
EPalWazaID::Unique_ElecPanda_ElecScratch.name: Lightning Claw

EPalWazaID::Unique_ElecPanda_GatlingAtta.description:
Grizzbolt's exclusive skill.
Attacks with a minigun pulled out from somewhere.
Ends with a single, charged power shot.
EPalWazaID::Unique_ElecPanda_GatlingAtta.name: Heavy Thunder Tank

EPalWazaID::Unique_FairyDragon_FairyTorn.description:
Elphidran's exclusive skill.
Generates twin whirlwinds imbued with a mysterious power
that pursues enemies.
EPalWazaID::Unique_FairyDragon_FairyTorn.name: Mystic Whirlwind

EPalWazaID::Unique_FeatherOstrich_Tossin.description:
Dazemu's exclusive skill.
Accelerates all at once 
and rushes forward at high speed.
EPalWazaID::Unique_FeatherOstrich_Tossin.name: Earth Dash

EPalWazaID::Unique_FengyunDeeper_CloudTe.description:
Fenglope's exclusive skill.
Charges forward while manipulating the atmosphere
to create a pressurized wind tunnel around itself.
EPalWazaID::Unique_FengyunDeeper_CloudTe.name: Cloud Tempest

EPalWazaID::Unique_FireKirin_Dark_DarkTo.description:
Pyrin Noct's exclusive skill.
Charges forward while clad in a veil of dark flames.
Flames continue to burn in its trajectory.
EPalWazaID::Unique_FireKirin_Dark_DarkTo.name: Dark Charge

EPalWazaID::Unique_FireKirin_Tackle.description:
Pyrin's exclusive skill.
Charges forward while clad in a veil of flames.
Flames continue to burn in its wake.
EPalWazaID::Unique_FireKirin_Tackle.name: Ignis Slam

EPalWazaID::Unique_FlameBuffalo_FlameHor.description:
Arsox's exclusive skill.
Takes aim and rushes at an enemy with a mad dash.
EPalWazaID::Unique_FlameBuffalo_FlameHor.name: Blazing Horn

EPalWazaID::Unique_FlowerDinosaur_Whip.description:
Dinossom's exclusive skill.
Uses large tail to smash the ground in front of it,
damaging enemies over a wide area.
EPalWazaID::Unique_FlowerDinosaur_Whip.name: Botanical Smash

EPalWazaID::Unique_Garm_Bite.description:
Direhowl's exclusive skill.
Swiftly leaps at an enemy and bites into them.
EPalWazaID::Unique_Garm_Bite.name: Fierce Fang

EPalWazaID::Unique_Gorilla_GroundPunch.description:
Gorirat's exclusive skill.
Pounds the ground twice before leaping into the air
and unleashing a powerful punch.
EPalWazaID::Unique_Gorilla_GroundPunch.name: Ground Pound

EPalWazaID::Unique_GrassPanda_Electric_E.description:
Mossanda Lux's exclusive skill.
Winds up its fist before pummeling an enemy with a flurry of electrically charged punches.
EPalWazaID::Unique_GrassPanda_Electric_E.name: Blast Punch

EPalWazaID::Unique_GrassPanda_MusclePunc.description:
Mossanda's exclusive skill.
Winds up its fist before striking an enemy with a devastating punch.
EPalWazaID::Unique_GrassPanda_MusclePunc.name: Crushing Punch

EPalWazaID::Unique_Grassmammoth_Earthqua.description:
Mammorest's exclusive skill.
Uses massive body to shake the earth,
dealing damage over a wide area.
EPalWazaID::Unique_Grassmammoth_Earthqua.name: Earth Impact

EPalWazaID::Unique_HawkBird_Storm.description:
Nitewing's exclusive skill.
Generates a tornado before soaring towards its target.
EPalWazaID::Unique_HawkBird_Storm.name: Tornado Attack

EPalWazaID::Unique_HerculesBeetle_Beetle.description:
Warsect's exclusive skill.
Skewers enemies with its four sturdy horns.
EPalWazaID::Unique_HerculesBeetle_Beetle.name: Giga Horn

EPalWazaID::Unique_Horus_FlareBird.description:
Faleris's exclusive skill.
Covers its body in a tornado of flames before charging forward.
EPalWazaID::Unique_Horus_FlareBird.name: Phoenix Flare

EPalWazaID::Unique_Horus_PerfectStorm.description:
Faleris' exclusive skill.
Generates multiple tornadoes of scorching fire and charges forward.
The tornadoes converge in the center and eventually merge into a single massive tornado.
EPalWazaID::Unique_Horus_PerfectStorm.name: Raging Flame Wave

EPalWazaID::Unique_IceDeer_IceHorn.description:
Reindrix's exclusive skill.
Charges at an enemy with antlers adorned in ice.
EPalWazaID::Unique_IceDeer_IceHorn.name: Freezing Charge

EPalWazaID::Unique_IceHorse_IceBladeAtta.description:
Frostallion's exclusive skill.
Dashes forward while concentrating frigid air around its wings,
using them to slash enemies with icy blade.
EPalWazaID::Unique_IceHorse_IceBladeAtta.name: Crystal Wing

EPalWazaID::Unique_JetDragon_JumpBeam.description:
Jetragon's exclusive skill.
Illuminates its wings and fires innumerable beams as it flies towards the enemy.
The beams explode on impact.
EPalWazaID::Unique_JetDragon_JumpBeam.name: Beam Comet

EPalWazaID::Unique_KingAlpaca_BodyPress.description:
Kingpaca's exclusive skill.
Leaps high into the air before
smashing into an enemy with its massive body.
EPalWazaID::Unique_KingAlpaca_BodyPress.name: Kingly Slam

EPalWazaID::Unique_KingBahamut_AirCrash.description:
Blazamut Ryu's exclusive skill.
After making a big jump, while moving at high speed in the air,
gathers strength and unleashes a punch with full might.
EPalWazaID::Unique_KingBahamut_AirCrash.name: Magna Crush

EPalWazaID::Unique_KingBahamut_ArmSmash.description:
Blazamut's exclusive skill.
Waves and pumps up its arms, the slams them together 
to create a large explosion in the surrounding area.
EPalWazaID::Unique_KingBahamut_ArmSmash.name: Brawn Impact

EPalWazaID::Unique_Kirin_LightningTackle.description:
Univolt's exclusive skill.
Generates bolts of lightning all around
while charging at its target.
EPalWazaID::Unique_Kirin_LightningTackle.name: Lightning Tackle

EPalWazaID::Unique_LilyQueen_LilyHealing.description:
Lyleen's exclusive skill.
Uses her healing power to recover her health.
Doesn't heal anyone else.
EPalWazaID::Unique_LilyQueen_LilyHealing.name: Bountiful Protection

EPalWazaID::Unique_LilyQueen_WindBarrier.description:
A skill exclusive to the Lilikin species.
Surround yourself with a wind barrier,
Returns the blade of wind to the attacking opponent.
EPalWazaID::Unique_LilyQueen_WindBarrier.name: Wind Barrier

EPalWazaID::Unique_MoonQueen_IceMoonBlad.description:
Selyne's exclusive skill.
Launches three high-speed swords 
imbued with moonlight power in succession.
EPalWazaID::Unique_MoonQueen_IceMoonBlad.name: Seigetsu Flash

EPalWazaID::Unique_MoonQueen_MoonBeam.description:
Selyne's exclusive skill.
Stores energy in the moon on its back,
then fires a crescent-shaped beam forward.
EPalWazaID::Unique_MoonQueen_MoonBeam.name: Moonlight Beam

EPalWazaID::Unique_MoonQueen_MoonBlade.description:
Selyne's exclusive skill.
Fires two consecutive high-speed blades
 imbued with the power of moonlight.
EPalWazaID::Unique_MoonQueen_MoonBlade.name: Seigetsu Blade

EPalWazaID::Unique_NaughtyCat_CatPress.description:
Grintale's exclusive skill.
Grins menacingly before leaping into the air
and smashing foes with its body.
EPalWazaID::Unique_NaughtyCat_CatPress.name: Cat Press

EPalWazaID::Unique_NightLady_FlameNightm.description:
Bellanoir Libero's exclusive skill.
Dances gracefully while creating an extending ring of flames.
Then, it fires mysterious flames that home in on enemies.
EPalWazaID::Unique_NightLady_FlameNightm.name: Flame Waltz

EPalWazaID::Unique_NightLady_WarpBeam.description:
Bellanoir Libero's exclusive skill.
Disappears suddenly, then reappears while firing a barrage of beams.
The beams spread like a beautiful flower in bloom.
EPalWazaID::Unique_NightLady_WarpBeam.name: Nightmare Bloom

EPalWazaID::Unique_NightLady_WarpBeam_St.description:
Bellanoir's exclusive skill.
Disappears suddenly, then reappears while firing a barrage of beams.
EPalWazaID::Unique_NightLady_WarpBeam_St.name: Nightmare Ray

EPalWazaID::Unique_PinkCat_CatPunch.description:
Cattiva's exclusive skill.
Pursues enemies, repeatedly punching them
with both its fists.
EPalWazaID::Unique_PinkCat_CatPunch.name: Punch Flurry

EPalWazaID::Unique_QueenBee_SpinLance.description:
Elizabee's exclusive skill.
Channels power into its staff, and unleashes it in a whirl.
EPalWazaID::Unique_QueenBee_SpinLance.name: Spinning Lance

EPalWazaID::Unique_RobinHood_BowSnipe.description:
Robinquill's exclusive skill.
Takes aim while drawing its bow
before loosing a powerful shot at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::Unique_RobinHood_BowSnipe.name: Focus Shot

EPalWazaID::Unique_Ronin_Iai.description:
Bushi's exclusive skill.
After Holding the sword, he appears in front of the enemy
in an instant and unleashes a Ultra-fast sword draw attack.
EPalWazaID::Unique_Ronin_Iai.name: Iaigiri

EPalWazaID::Unique_SaintCentaur_OneSpear.description:
Paladius's exclusive skill.
Clads itself in holy power before charging forward with its spear.
The shield in its other hand protects from attacks during the charge.
EPalWazaID::Unique_SaintCentaur_OneSpear.name: Spear Thrust

EPalWazaID::Unique_SakuraSaurus_SideTack.description:
Broncherry's exclusive skill.
Turns sideways before tackling enemies in front of it,
sending them flying into the air.
EPalWazaID::Unique_SakuraSaurus_SideTack.name: Muscle Slam

EPalWazaID::Unique_ScorpionMan_Uppercut.description: Prixter's exclusive skill. Closes the distance to the enemy at high speed, then attacks decisively with its pincers.
EPalWazaID::Unique_ScorpionMan_Uppercut.name: Upper Smash

EPalWazaID::Unique_SheepBall_Roll.description:
SheepBall's exclusive skill.
Curls into a ball, rolling after any enemies in its way.
Becomes dizzy and unable to move after the attack ends.
EPalWazaID::Unique_SheepBall_Roll.name: Roly Poly

EPalWazaID::Unique_SifuDog_Counter.description:
Dogen's exclusive skill.
Adopts an aiki stance. While in stance, any attack is nullified,
then instantly countered with a full-force palm strike.
EPalWazaID::Unique_SifuDog_Counter.name: Wholehearted Stance

EPalWazaID::Unique_ThunderDragonMan_Nume.description:
Orserk's exclusive skill.
Summons numerous thunder spears and hurls them at the enemy.
The first spear is imbued with the power of lightning and explodes after a few seconds.
EPalWazaID::Unique_ThunderDragonMan_Nume.name: Polykeraunos

EPalWazaID::Unique_ThunderDragonMan_Thun.description:
Orserk's exclusive skill.
Summons a spear of lightning while leaping into the air
before throwing it at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::Unique_ThunderDragonMan_Thun.name: Kerauno

EPalWazaID::Unique_VolcanicMonster_Ice_I.description:
Reptyro Cryst's exclusive skill.
Raises its front legs and slams them into the ground
causing frozen blasts under its enemies.
It simultaneously pounds them with snow balls from above.
EPalWazaID::Unique_VolcanicMonster_Ice_I.name: Frost Burst

EPalWazaID::Unique_VolcanicMonster_Magma.description:
Reptyro's exclusive skill.
Raises its front legs before slamming them into the ground,
causing volcanic eruptions under its enemies.
It simultaneously bombards them with volcanic bombs from above.
EPalWazaID::Unique_VolcanicMonster_Magma.name: Volcanic Burst

EPalWazaID::Unique_WeaselDragon_FlyingTa.description:
Chillet's exclusive skill.
Gathers a bit of strength and it leaps forward.
When landing it's always scared so it closes its eyes.
EPalWazaID::Unique_WeaselDragon_FlyingTa.name: Rocket Slam

EPalWazaID::Unique_Werewolf_Scratch.description:
WereWolf's exclusive skill.
Leaps forward and attacks twice with vicious claws
imbued with dark energy.
EPalWazaID::Unique_Werewolf_Scratch.name: Jumping Claw

EPalWazaID::Unique_WingGolem_RoundCutter.description:
Knocklem's exclusive skill.
Takes a big swing and throws the ring on its back.
The ring flies in a circular trajectory.
EPalWazaID::Unique_WingGolem_RoundCutter.name: Ground Cutter

EPalWazaID::WallSplash.description: Continously creates walls made from water columns at the enemy's location.
EPalWazaID::WallSplash.name: Curtain Splash

EPalWazaID::WaterBall.description:
Creates a giant ball of water
and hurls it at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::WaterBall.name: Aqua Burst

EPalWazaID::WaterGun.description:
Hurls a ball of water
straight at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::WaterGun.name: Aqua Gun

EPalWazaID::WindCutter.description:
Fires a high speed blade of wind
that flies straight at an enemy.
EPalWazaID::WindCutter.name: Wind Cutter

EPalWazaID::WindEdge.description: Launches sharp blades of air that fan out.
EPalWazaID::WindEdge.name: Wind Edge
